channel.title: Server Help Plase
channel.description: Hey everyone I'm having problems compiling i already changed the compiler to make sure i could use it with my jdk but it still says its unidentified with javac and i already fixed my classpath and path.. I have windows vista can someone tell me what to put in it and what should i do...

item.title: Server Help Plase
item.dc:creator: @slaya101 slaya101
item.description:
@slaya101 wrote:

[quote=“Scarr, post:2, topic:225029”]Here’s my compiler,

@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

Try that one, change the 07 to what type of java you have.[/quote]

ty ill check if it helps

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help Plase
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

Here’s my compiler,

@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

Try that one, change the 07 to what type of java you have.
